(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (VP (VBG wondering)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP what))
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB do)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ beloved)
                      (NP (DT this) (NNP Valentine) (POS 's))
                      (NN Day)))))
              (, ,))))))))


mark(wondering-4, If-1)
nsubj(wondering-4, you-2)
aux(wondering-4, are-3)
root(ROOT-0, wondering-4)
dobj(do-8, what-5)
nsubj(do-8, you-6)
aux(do-8, can-7)
ccomp(wondering-4, do-8)
prep(do-8, for-9)
poss(Day-15, your-10)
amod(Day-15, beloved-11)
det(Valentine-13, this-12)
poss(Day-15, Valentine-13)
possessive(Valentine-13, 's-14)
pobj(for-9, Day-15)


(ROOT
  (SQ (MD may)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VB suggest)
      (NP
        (NP (NN breakfast))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NN bed))))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (JJ truffle) (NN mayonnaise) (NN scrambled) (NNS eggs))))
    (. !)))


aux(suggest-3, may-1)
nsubj(suggest-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, suggest-3)
dobj(suggest-3, breakfast-4)
prep(breakfast-4, in-5)
pobj(in-5, bed-6)
prep(suggest-3, with-7)
amod(eggs-11, truffle-8)
nn(eggs-11, mayonnaise-9)
nn(eggs-11, scrambled-10)
pobj(with-7, eggs-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN divided)
        (NP (DT the) (NN video))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP (CD two) (NNS parts)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(divided-3, We-1)
aux(divided-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, divided-3)
det(video-5, the-4)
dobj(divided-3, video-5)
prep(divided-3, into-6)
num(parts-8, two-7)
pobj(into-6, parts-8)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN For)
    (NP
      (NP (DT those))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADVP (RB already))
            (VP (VBG struggling)
              (PP (IN with)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG cracking)
                    (NP (DT an) (NN egg))
                    (ADVP (RB properly)))
                  (, ,))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, For-1)
pobj(For-1, those-2)
nsubj(struggling-6, who-3)
aux(struggling-6, are-4)
advmod(struggling-6, already-5)
rcmod(those-2, struggling-6)
prep(struggling-6, with-7)
pcomp(with-7, cracking-8)
det(egg-10, an-9)
dobj(cracking-8, egg-10)
advmod(cracking-8, properly-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN video))
    (ADVP (RB above))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (PRP you))))
    (. .)))


det(video-2, the-1)
nsubj(is-4, video-2)
advmod(is-4, above-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
prep(is-4, for-5)
pobj(for-5, you-6)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC But)
    (PP (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP want)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN something))
                  (PRN
                    (ADVP (RB really))
                    (NP (JJ special))
                    (, ,)))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, But-1)
prep(But-1, if-2)
nsubj(want-4, you-3)
pcomp(if-2, want-4)
aux(do-6, to-5)
xcomp(want-4, do-6)
dobj(do-6, something-7)
dep(special-9, really-8)
dep(something-7, special-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB add)
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Tim) (POS 's))
            (JJ truffle) (NN mayonnaise)))
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (VP (VBN shown)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT the) (NN video)))
              (ADVP (RB below)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(add-3, you-1)
aux(add-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, add-3)
prep(add-3, on-4)
nn(Tim-6, Chef-5)
poss(mayonnaise-9, Tim-6)
possessive(Tim-6, 's-7)
amod(mayonnaise-9, truffle-8)
pobj(on-4, mayonnaise-9)
mark(shown-11, as-10)
advcl(add-3, shown-11)
prep(shown-11, in-12)
det(video-14, the-13)
pobj(in-12, video-14)
advmod(shown-11, below-15)


(ROOT
  (S (RB Then)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADJP (RB almost) (VBN guaranteed)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB make)
              (NP (DT that)
                (ADJP (RB very) (JJ special))
                (NN person) (NN swoon)))))))
    (. !)))


advmod(guaranteed-5, Then-1)
nsubjpass(guaranteed-5, you-2)
auxpass(guaranteed-5, are-3)
advmod(guaranteed-5, almost-4)
root(ROOT-0, guaranteed-5)
aux(make-7, to-6)
xcomp(guaranteed-5, make-7)
det(swoon-12, that-8)
advmod(special-10, very-9)
amod(swoon-12, special-10)
nn(swoon-12, person-11)
dobj(make-7, swoon-12)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (DT All))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJS best))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ scrambled) (NNS eggs))))
    (PP (IN with)
      (NP (JJ truffle) (NN mayonnaise)))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, All-1)
det(best-3, the-2)
dep(All-1, best-3)
prep(best-3, with-4)
poss(eggs-7, your-5)
amod(eggs-7, scrambled-6)
pobj(with-4, eggs-7)
prep(All-1, with-8)
amod(mayonnaise-10, truffle-9)
pobj(with-8, mayonnaise-10)


(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Have)
    (NP (DT a) (JJ Happy)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Valentine) (POS 's))
          (NN Day))
        (CC and)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ prosperous) (NNP Chinese) (NNP New))))
    (VP (VBN Year))
    (. !)))


aux(Year-12, Have-1)
det(Day-6, a-2)
amod(Day-6, Happy-3)
poss(Day-6, Valentine-4)
possessive(Valentine-4, 's-5)
nsubj(Year-12, Day-6)
cc(Day-6, and-7)
det(New-11, a-8)
amod(New-11, prosperous-9)
nn(New-11, Chinese-10)
conj(Day-6, New-11)
root(ROOT-0, Year-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB watch)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN rest))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ ieat) (NNS videos))))
        (ADVP (RB here))))))


nsubj(watch-3, You-1)
aux(watch-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, watch-3)
det(rest-5, the-4)
dobj(watch-3, rest-5)
prep(rest-5, of-6)
det(videos-9, the-7)
amod(videos-9, ieat-8)
pobj(of-6, videos-9)
advmod(watch-3, here-10)
